extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE  A grade of C in ENGL100/6.0 & registration in a ENGL major or medial plan
Ex No more than 3.0 units from ENGL290

basic.description: An intensive study of one text or a cluster of related texts, cultivating close reading skills through discussion. The course develops students¿ writing abilities and also introduces the basic research tools of literary studies.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Seminar in Literature Interpretation
